summary: Comprehensive testing completed for the visitor fleet management system. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all CRUD operations working perfectly. Frontend flows tested successfully including login, navigation, forms, and core business logic. Only minor UI interaction issue found with dropdown selection in admin page.

ui_bugs.issue: Role dropdown selection timeout - Playwright unable to click dropdown option despite options being visible
ui_bugs.note: Functional issue may be related to dropdown animation timing or z-index layering in modal

passed_tests: Backend API - Login with admin/admin123 (100% success rate - 56/56 tests passed)
Backend API - All CRUD operations for visitors, schedules, fleet, users
Backend API - Dashboard statistics and reports
Backend API - Excel and PDF export functionality
Frontend - Login redirects to dashboard with KPI stats
Frontend - Navigation to all pages (Visitors, Schedules, Fleet, Reports, Admin)
Frontend - Visitor registration and checkout workflow
Frontend - Fleet departure and return with distance calculation
Frontend - Export buttons are enabled and functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Admin page role dropdown selection has timing/interaction issue. The dropdown opens properly and shows options but Playwright cannot select options due to timeout. This may be related to z-index layering or animation timing in the modal dialog. Consider adding a small delay after opening dropdown or adjusting dropdown component timing.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major flows working, one minor dropdown interaction issue
